import React, { Component } from "react"; class CreateWork extends Component { render() { Dropzone.options.uploadWidget = { paramName: "file", maxFilesize: 2, // MB maxFiles: 1, dictDefaultMessage: "Drag an image here to upload, or click to select one", headers: { "x-csrf-token": document .querySelectorAll("meta[name=csrf-token]")[0] .getAttributeNode("content").value, }, acceptedFiles: "image/*", init: function () { this.on("success", function (file, resp) { console.log(file); console.log(resp); }); this.on("thumbnail", function (file) { if (file.accepted !== false) { if (file.width < 640 || file.height < 480) { file.rejectDimensions(); } else { file.acceptDimensions(); } } }); }, accept: function (file, done) { file.acceptDimensions = done; file.rejectDimensions = function () { done("The image must be at least 640 x 480px"); }; }, }; return (
Create a new Work


); } } export default CreateWork;
